This is the student consultant handbook for members of Eagle I.O. Herein lie expectations, responsibilities, and strategy to keep Eagle I.O sustainable with future [Montclair State University I/O Psychology](https://www.montclair.edu/psychology/graduate-programs/industrial-organizational-psychology/) cohorts...


# Introduction

This is the participation manual for Eagle I.O student consultants. It contains the expectations, roles, and responsibilities of MSU graduate students who are *also* members of Eagle I.O.

> The vision and mission of Eagle I.O are...

+ As of the Spring 2020 semester, the ongoing projects that Eagle I.O manages include: 
    1) a [mentorship program](https://bookdown.org/kulasj/mentoruser/) between the 1^st^ year and returning MSU I.O Masters' and PhD program students, 
    2) an engagement survey, and 
    3) this student consultant manual (which includes, for example, a succession plan to sustain and grow Eagle I.O)
+ Future aspirations are to have Eagle I.O be a client-facing organization that can provide student-led solutions to external clients
